00021 template <class Gradient>
00022 class TComposedColorGradient: virtual public IColorTransformation
00023 {
00024 public:
00025        void AddGradient(const istd::CRange& intervall, const Gradient& gradient);
00026 
00027        // reimplemented (icmm::IColorTransformation)
00028        virtual bool GetValueAt(const Argument& argument, Result& result) const;
00029        virtual Result GetValueAt(const Argument& argument) const;
00030 
00031 private:
00032        typedef QPair<istd::CRange, Gradient> IntervallGradient;
00033        typedef QVector<IntervallGradient> Gradients;
00034        
00035        Gradients m_gradients;
00036 };
00037 
00038 
00039 // public methods
00040 
00041 template <class GradientFunction>
00042 void TColorGradient<GradientFunction>::AddGradient(const istd::CRange& intervall, const Gradient& gradient)
00043 {
00044        m_gradients.push_back(std::make_pair<istd::CRange, Gradient>(intervall, gradient));
00045 }
00046 
00047 
00048 // reimplemented (icmm::IColorTransformation)
00049 
00050 template <class GradientFunction>
00051 bool TColorGradient<GradientFunction>::GetValueAt(const Argument& argument, Result& result) const
00052 {
00053        for (int gradientIndex = 0; gradientIndex < int(m_gradients.size()); gradientIndex++){
00054               IntervallGradient gradient = m_gradients[gradientIndex];
00055 
00056               if (gradient.first.Contains(argument)){
00057                      return gradient.second.GetValueAt(argument, result);
00058               }
00059        }
00060        
00061        return false;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 template <class GradientFunction>
00066 TColorGradient<GradientFunction>::Result TColorGradient<GradientFunction>::GetValueAt(const Argument& argument) const
00067 {
00068        ResultType result;
00069 
00070        GetValueAt(argument, result);
00071 
00072        return result;
00073 }
